mapper.sql: from wishlist a left join product b on a.product_productSeq = b.productSeq left join fileuploaded c on c.fileUploadedFseq = b.productSeq and c.fileUploadedDefaultNy = 1 where 1=1 and a.wishListDelNy = 0 and a.members_membersSeq = #{membersSeqF}
mapper.select: select a.wishListSeq ,a.wishListDelNy ,a.wishListUseNy ,a.wishListRegDate ,a.wishListModDate ,a.members_membersSeq as membersSeqF ,a.product_productSeq as productSeqF ,b.productSeq ,b.productName ,b.productPrice ,b.productStock ,c.fileUploadedPath ,c.fileUploadedFseq ,c.fileUploadedDefaultNy

select a.wishListSeq ,a.wishListDelNy ,a.wishListUseNy ,a.wishListRegDate ,a.wishListModDate ,a.members_membersSeq as membersSeqF ,a.product_productSeq as productSeqF from wishlist a where 1=1 and a.wishlistDelNy = 0 and a.wishListSeq = #{wishListSeq}
mapper.update: update wishlist set wishListDelNy = 1 WHERE 1=1 and wishListSeq = #{wishListSeq}
